name: MagicGirls★Shooting!!
description:
This a side-scrolling gal-shooting game, which is an old project I made in the past, and only has one level. Just earning a listing fee, and there will be no updates in the future. The game will last about 5 minutes, so if you don’t like it, just refund it. If you are willing to support and keep this product, sincerely thank you! ! At first, I decided to sell it for US$0.2, but this is far lower than the minimum price limit on Steam. The game can only be discounted after launch, and the lowest discount at launch can only be 40%. Accroding to Steam policy, discounts are allowed once every two months, and this game will be set to 80% off during every discount season.

WASD Move


K Shoot


U Switch


L Dash


J Charged Attack


J Full Charged Attack · Prification


Shooting consumes MP
